nodes.text: The Nek Pup armored gun platform was a mobile platform used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.
The Nek Pup armored gun platform was equipped with a repeater blaster rifle.
Several Nek Pup platforms were put into use by members of the 14th and 85th Infantry Brigades on Haurgab, where they were used to provide cover for Omega Squad, and put down pockets of resistance.
